title: Not That Scary Horror - Halloween Inspired Music Pack
description: This pack contains 10 light horror music themes, along with 3 stingers and a bunch of alternative versions and loops (44 audio files in total). Created to accompany Halloween projects that require a casual, spooky & creepy feel to them.
longDescription:
'Not That Scary Horror' is all about that spooky and creepy casual horror sound! We included 10 different themes & 3 stingers, along with a bunch of loops and alternative edits ( 44HQ audio files in total). This pack offers the flexibility needed to make your next Halloween game project sound cohesive and professional. We could definitely imagine it being used during the gameplay or in the main menu of an adventure, arcade, RPG, or any kind of light horror-themed game! Of course, this pack is suitable for a wide variety of different uses, not necessarily tied to game development projects.


Preview available on our official SoundCloud channel here:

https://soundcloud.com/cyberwave-orchestra/sets/not-that-scary-horror-game-music-pack


If you need other types of horror sound packs, check these out:

Dark Horror Piano Music Loops

Solitude - Dark Sci-Fi Space Horror Loops

Ultimate Horror Game SFX


CONTENT of Not That Scary Horror:

  1. Creepy Closet
  2. Vampires
  3. Dance Of The Zombies
  4. Little Monsters
  5. Midnight Hour
  6. Night Critters
  7. Tremors
  8. Exploring The Garden
  9. Harpsichord Background 1
  10. Harpsichord Background 2


STINGERS:

  • Stinger 1
  • Stinger 2
  • Stinger 3
technicalDetails:
Specs:

Number of Audio Wavs: 44

Number of Audio Cues: 44

Format: 44.1 kHz, 16 bit, Stereo, WAV

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 45:00

Supported Development Platforms: All


Thank You!
